title: An in situ formed ZIF-67 derived NiFeCo-P nano-array for accelerating the electrocatalytic oxygen evolution reaction
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3YA00581J, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Xi Guo, Li Li, Shuo Wang, Huan Zhang, Yuzhen Kuang, Guangbin Duan, Bingqiang Cao
Phosphating ternary nickel/iron/cobalt hybrid nano-arrays (NiFeCo-P) synthesized by three steps of impregnation, hydrothermal reaction and phosphating calcination exhibits low overpotential, good kinetics and high structural stability.
